name: Painting pictures
description: Painter and photographer Louis Le Prince was inspired to develop the technology to make animated pictures by the circular panoramic paintings of his friends. His films captured everyday life and alluded to his artistic vision for cinema.

key_work.title: Louis Le Prince
key_work.brief_description: In 1888, French inventor Louis Le Prince used a single-lens camera to record the first motion pictures outside his home in Leeds. Though it lasted just two seconds, Roundhay Garden Scene was revolutionary.
